title: Noam Chomsky / Bad Faith Debate on Voting for Biden (ft. Ben Burgis)
description:
From Jacobin's original series Weekends,  Ana and Nando talk to Ben Burgis about Briahna Joy Gray and Virgil Texas's debate with Noam Chomsky about electoral strategy.

Tune into "Weekends" every Saturday at 1 PM Eastern on this channel.
Full video here: https://youtu.be/gNM0l4bQj10

Subscribe to the channel and press the like button!
Subscribe to Jacobin: https://jacobinmag.com/subscribe/?code=AFTERBERNIE

Music provided by Zonkey: https://linktr.ee/zonkey
